00031 Clip::Clip (const Magick::Image &image, const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const unsigned int &height, const unsigned int &width)
00032     : image_(image)
00033 {
00034     try
00035     {
00036         // Associate a frame with the image
00037         frame_ = new Magick::Pixels(image_);
00038     }
00039     catch (std::exception &e)
00040     {
00041         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00042     }
00043     
00044     
00045     // Test the clip top left-most corner is inside the image
00046     if ( x >= image_.rows() or x < 0 )
00047     {
00048         delete frame_;
00049         throw NessieException ("In constructor Clip::Clip(): The X coordinate of clip's upper leftmost pixel is out of image borders");
00050     }
00051     else
00052         x_ = x;
00053     
00054     if ( y >= image_.columns() or y < 0 )
00055     {
00056         delete frame_;
00057         throw NessieException ("In constructor Clip::Clip(): The Y coordinate of clip's upper leftmost pixel is out of image borders");
00058     }
00059     else
00060         y_ = y;
00061     
00062         
00063     // Test the clip size is consistent with the image size
00064     if ( (x_ + height) > image_.rows() )
00065         height_ = image_.rows() - x_;
00066     else
00067         height_ = height;
00068     
00069     if ( (y_ + width) > image_.columns() )
00070         width_ = image_.columns() - y_;
00071     else
00072         width_ = width;
00073         
00074     
00075     try
00076     {
00077         // Initializes the pointer to the clip origin
00078         originPixel_ = frame_->get(x_, y_, width_, height_);
00079         
00080         // Convert the image into a grayscale mode
00081         image_.type(Magick::GrayscaleType);     
00082     }
00083     catch (std::exception &e)
00084     {
00085         delete frame_;
00086         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00087     }
00088 };

00099     delete frame_;

00139 void Clip::x (const unsigned int &x)
00140 {
00141     if ( x >= image_.rows() or x < 0 )
00142         throw NessieException ("Clip::xOrigin(const unsigned int &x): The X coordinate of clip's upper leftmost pixel is out of image borders");
00143     else
00144         x_ = x;
00145     
00146     adjustClipSize();
00147     relocateClipOrigin();
00148 };

00260 Pixel Clip::getPixel (const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y) const
00261 {
00262     // Check the location is inside the clip borders
00263     if ( (x >= height_) or (x < 0) )
00264         throw NessieException ("Clip::getPixel(const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y): The X coordinate is out of image borders");
00265     
00266     if ( (y >= width_) or (y < 0) )
00267         throw NessieException ("Clip::getPixel(const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y): The Y coordinate is out of image borders");
00268     
00269     // Get the pixel at desired location
00270     Magick::PixelPacket* selectedPixel = originPixel_ + (x * width_) + y;
00271     
00272     try
00273     {
00274         // Build a Pixel object with the pixel gray level
00275         Magick::ColorGray grayLevel(*selectedPixel);
00276         return Pixel(x, y, grayLevel.shade());
00277     }
00278     catch (std::exception &e)
00279     {
00280         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00281         return Pixel();
00282     }
00283 };

00298 void Clip::setPixel (const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const double &grayLevel)
00299 {
00300     try
00301     {
00302         // Ensure that there is only one reference to underlying image.
00303         // If this is not done, then image pixels will not be modified.
00304         image_.modifyImage();
00305     
00306         // Check the location is inside the clip borders
00307         if ( x >= height_ or x < 0 )
00308             throw NessieException ("Clip::setPixel(const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const double &grayLevel): The X coordinate is out of image borders");
00309 
00310         if ( y >= width_ or y < 0 )
00311             throw NessieException ("Clip::setPixel(const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const double &grayLevel): The Y coordinate is out of image borders");
00312 
00313         // Get the pixel at desired location
00314         Magick::PixelPacket* selectedPixel = originPixel_ + (x * width_) + y;
00315 
00316         // Assign the desired value to the pixel
00317         *selectedPixel = Magick::ColorGray(grayLevel);
00318 
00319         // Apply changes on the image
00320         frame_->sync();
00321     }
00322     catch (std::exception &e)
00323     {
00324         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00325     }
00326 };

00335 void Clip::relocateClipOrigin ()
00336 {
00337     try
00338     {       
00339         // Relocate the pointer to the clip new origin
00340         originPixel_ = frame_->get(x_, y_, width_, height_);
00341     }
00342     catch (std::exception &e)
00343     {
00344         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00345     }   
00346 };

00348 
00356 void Clip::adjustClipSize ()
00357 {
00358     if ( (y_ + width_) > image_.columns() )
00359         width_ = image_.columns() - y_;
00360     
00361     if ( (x_ + height_) > image_.rows() )
00362         height_ = image_.rows() - x_;
00363 };
